feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 9:18 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -14.6°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
